description: MAP PLAN ONLY I have planned this trek on google earth and TOPO Canada 4.0 maps.  I have evaluated the elevation graphs and have speculated that this trip could be done in 3 days.  I have marked planned camps for 2 nights, and 1 summit.
directions: Heat to Hummingbird Falls, continue up the valley to the north until the dry river bed where sign says no trucks permitted any further.
title: Vision Quest
